thumb.title: 【TAS】CAPCOM VS. SNK 2 (HAOHMARU, K-GROOVE)
thumb.description: CAPCOM VS SNK 2Millionaire Fighting 2001GameCube Version (EO)(2002, CAPCOM)Character/Groove/Ratio - Haohmaru, K-Groove, R4Challenge - Use Just Defend, Inflict High Damage and finish the rounds with Finest K.O.難易度・★★★★★★★★ (Lvl.8, Hardest)Tool Assisted Run1 Coin Credit, No Matches Lost===00:00 Game Options00:10 Groove Select (K-Groove)00:14 Character Select (Haohmaru)00:21 Ratio Adjustment (R4)00:26 Match 1 (Nakoruru, Terry Bogard)01:43 Match 2 (Kyosuke, Yamazaki, Zangief)04:04 Match 3 (Kyo, Todoh, Sakura)05:54 Match 4 (Morrigan, Eagle)07:30 Match 5 (Vega)08:25 Match 6 (Ken, Haohmaru)10:02 Final Match (God Rugal)10:49 End Game11:14 Thanks For Watching!======ご視聴感謝するThanks For Watching!
thumb.last_res_body: 露骨だなw ファイコレ2でたら... Kグルはなぁ・・痛... そりゃポン刀で切... 恭介「僕には勝て... 相手レシオ２でも...
